extendedInfo.description: â Please email our support team before leaving negative feedback. We can't respond to feedback in Google Play, and we may be able to help you. Thanks! ââ On SALE now! ââââââSee thousands of real success stories and race photos of your fellow runners using these running program at Facebook.com/c25kfreeFrom the same makers of the #1 C25K app, Half Marathon Trainer follows the same successful recipe to create an easy simple program, best suited for first-time half marathoners and those who are new to running. The program uses a blend of running and power walking in training and racing. Youâll soon be able to run-walk the half marathon. This proven 14 week plan will allow users to slowly build strength and stamina by alternating between walking and running. The blend of walking and running together reduces the overall impact and risk of injury, makes training more fun, keeps your body guessing, and prepares you to go the distance. By the end of the program, you will be fitter, stronger and READY for your half marathon race!Listen to your favorite music while you train and follow the programâs convenient audio alerts. Along with voice/audio alerts and music controls on your headset, just press âstartâ, put your device in your pocket, and you are ready to go. Alerts will tell you when to warm-up, walk, run, cooldown, and when minute is left to give it your all. - Proven 14 week half-marathon training program- Listen to your own favorite music and playlist while you train- Easy and intuitive interface. Nothing to learn!- Convenient audio coach and alerts- Compatible with Nike+GPS- Integrated with Facebook and Twitter communities. Meet other fellow marathoners and runners!- The only half-marathon trainer app that works accurately while your device is locked! The Breast Cancer Research Foundation Â®Zen Labs has chosen to support The Breast Cancer Research Foundation Â®  in the fight against breast cancer. By using our apps to improve your health and quality of life, you are directly contributing to this cause. We will donate five percent of your purchases to The Breast Cancer Research Foundation Â®. Legal DisclaimerThis app and any information given by it or by Zen Labs LLC are for educational purposes only. They are not intended nor implied to be a substitute for professional medical advice. You should always consult your healthcare provider before beginning any fitness program.

reviews.title: Frustrated
reviews.comment: It works but in the beginning of your run when you\'re setting up your music and GPS it stops. And occasionally stops after your halfway notification.
reviews.author: Katie Hitzeman

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Exactly what I was looking for! I can hear the voice prompts & everything just fine. So far, so good.
reviews.author: Chawn Sah

reviews.title: Not as good as I thought.
reviews.comment: I like the app but the stopwatch is way off.  By the end of my first run it was 20 seconds off of my Garmin\'s time.  Also, it would be nice to be able to lock the screen.
reviews.author: Eric Jarrell

reviews.title: Like...don\'t love...just like.
reviews.comment: I have no problem hearing the cues, which is great, but the cues come in 2 times. Once, 30 seconds BEFORE it\'s supposed to go off, second time at the right time. Please fix then I can give you 5 *\'s
reviews.author: Adnyl Serolf

reviews.title: Shorter run intervals than a 10k app?
reviews.comment: This is not at all what i had expected! Especially since i really do love the free 10k training app. In that app you actually train to run the 10k distance. On the last day of this app you run for 4min & walk 1min... 26x. If you really want to train to run a half marathon this is NOT the app for you. Save your money!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works Great
reviews.comment: I love this app-great run/walk training program for beginning runners training for first half marathon. Seems to me most of the bugs are fixed. I have no problem hearing voice cues over my music. I use MOG - and both apps run fine together on my HTC Droid Incredible -no glitches, ample battery life.  Great looking interface, and simple to use. You need to be able to jog or race walk for 3 minute intervals starting with first workout - 45 minute total workout duration week 1 day 1.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I wish I could love this app!
reviews.comment: Worked great the first week. Then it went south. It re-set itself, would not go to the appropriate week, the commands were, and at times wouldn\'t even open. I have uninstalled, and reinstalled several times. I hope the bugs get fixed soon!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: BUGS ARE NOT FIXED
reviews.comment: This app resets itself whenever I switch screens or place in pocket.  Cannot hear any notifications over music even with music turned down.  Marathon trainer is the same despite promises of a fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor customer service!
reviews.comment: The app will probably be enough for some, but wasn\'t watt I was looking for. Right after I opened it my tab crashed and when I restarted the option for refund was gone. Right away (literally not even 10 minutes after purchase) I contacted customer service if there was a way to get my money back.  No reply, not even an explanation as to why I wouldn\'t get my money back, NOTHING. really really bad.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stinks Needs Improvement
reviews.comment: I like the display, but cannot hear the training ques while listening to music. Also, does not keep accurate time. Wish I could get my money back.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice but???
reviews.comment: Can\'t hear cues. Even with the music turned down. will have to hold the phone in my hand and look at the changes. love the design  of program just can\'t use it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy and effective!
reviews.comment: This trainer app is just what I need to get back into summer shape. This interface is better than anything else I\'ve downloaded.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LOVE IT! Best half-marathon training app out there
reviews.comment: Great app!! about time someone made a marathon training app for Android! The schedule is straight foward and I love how I get to listen to my own music and just follow the voice commands. Sweet grahics!
reviews.author: A Google User
